mapper.sql: id, user_id, notice_type, is_read, title, content, picture, create_time, create_by, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(mun.notice_type = 1) AS expressNum, SUM(mun.notice_type = 3) AS taskRewardNum , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mm_interact_rel_message_object mirmo LEFT JOIN mm_interact_push mip ON mirmo.push_id = mip.id WHERE mirmo.object_id = #{userId} AND mip.push_type = 'APP内消息中心推送' AND mirmo.is_read = 0 ) AS systemNoticeNum1, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mm_interact_push mip, um_user uu WHERE uu.id = #{userId} AND mip.object_type = '全部用户' AND push_type = 'APP内消息中心推送' AND uu.create_time > mip.create_time ) AS systemNoticeNum2 FROM mm_user_notice mun WHERE mun.user_id = #{userId} AND mun.is_read = 0

SELECT mun.id mun.notice_type, mun.is_read, mun.title, mun.content, mun.picture, mun.create_time FROM mm_user_notice mun WHERE mun.`user_id` = #{userId} AND mun.`notice_type` = #{noticeType} ORDER BY mun.create_time DESC
